review: I got this for Christmas, and I've got to say, best gift ever. Although it may not seem like a big deal, copying movies onto a usb drive takes forever, and with this, all I have to do is stream it directly from my computer to the Chromecast. Don't waste your money on Apple TV or Amazon Fire, get Chromecast. It's cheaper than it's competitors and has a lot more convenient features.
author: Brandon "Brandon Stump"

review: Absolutely one of the best electronic devices I have ever purchased. I had been thinking of canceling my cable subscription for some time but the purchase of a HD smart TV and the Chromecast finally convinced me to go ahead and go digital. There are do many Chromecast apps. I was able to turn my kitchen TB into  "smart" TV with this device. I can watch Netflix, YouTube, and can cast stuff from the web.  This is really a bargain.
